alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 12:46AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Callahan, southeastern Jones, Shackelford and Taylor Counties through 130 AM CST... At 1245 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from Hawley to Abilene to Happy Valley, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Albany, Baird, Wylie, Tye, Tuscola, Hawley, Buffalo Gap, Lueders, Lawn, Dudley, Bradshaw, Rowden, Caps, Dyess Afb, Eula, Potosi, View and Happy Valley. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 274 and 314. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for west central Texas.
